typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees
Employees filter(equals(department,'3')) ~> FilterPayrollDep
FilterPayrollDep sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['payrollEmp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PayrollEmpData
